id.description: The unique identifier of the review

consumer.description: Information about the consumer who left the review

id.description: The unique identifier of the consumer

displayName.description: The display name of the consumer

displayLocation.description: The display location of the consumer

numberOfReviews.description: The total number of reviews left by the consumer

businessUnit.description: Information about the business unit associated with the review

id.description: The unique identifier of the business unit

identifyingName.description: The identifying name of the business unit

displayName.description: The display name of the business unit

stars.description: The star rating given in the review

text.description: The main text content of the review

language.description: The language used in the review

urlFormattedName.description: Formatted URL of the location name

id.description: The unique identifier of the location

createdAt.description: The date and time when the review was created

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the review was last updated

experiencedAt.description: The date and time when the reviewer experienced the reviewed service

referralEmail.description: Referral email associated with the review

companyReply.description: Reply provided by the company to the review

createdAt.description: The date and time when the reply was created

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the reply was last updated

text.description: The text content of the reply

authorBusinessUserId.description: The ID of the author business user of the reply

tags.description: List of tags associated with the review

group.description: The group to which the tag belongs

isEligible.description: Indicates if the reviewer is eligible

requests.description: List of reviewer requests for additional information

items.description: Details of a specific reviewer request

submittedAt.description: The date and time when the response was submitted

businessUserMessage.description: Message from the business user in response to the reviewer

id.description: The unique identifier of the request

created.description: The date and time when the request was created

isVerified.description: Indicates if the review is verified

numberOfLikes.description: The total number of likes received by the review

reportData.description: Data related to report on the review

publicComment.description: Public comment provided in the report

createdAt.description: The date and time when the report was created

reasons.description: List of reasons for the report

items.$comment: Data structure at this point is unknown

complianceLabels.description: List of labels related to compliance

countsTowardsTrustScore.description: Indicates whether the review counts towards the overall trust score

countsTowardsLocationTrustScore.description: Indicates whether the review counts towards the location trust score

businessUnitId.description: The ID of the business unit associated with the invitation

businessUnitHistory.description: History of changes to the business unit

items.description: Details of a specific history entry

identifyingName.description: The identifying name of the business unit at the time of change

displayName.description: The display name of the business unit at the time of change

businessUnitId.description: The ID of the business unit associated with this history entry

changeDate.description: The date and time when the change occurred

reviewVerificationLevel.description: The level of verification for the review
